amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for NASA University Research Centers by $2.8 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 33 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the NASA Science, Aeronautics and Technology account by $2.8 million by reducing the account for NASA Human Space Flight account by $2.8 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cummings amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
